article: Sam Kaye is only 12 years old. But he is a famous photographer not only in the UK, but also in  other  countries. He is even the youngest member of the Royal Photographic Society (RPS,) of the UK. It was  set up  in 1853 and it has a long history. It was the  _  photographic society in the world. About one third of its members are famous photographers all over the world. Sam Kays started taking photos  _  the age of six. Last year, the UK schoolboy went on a trip to Africa with his parents. He took lots of photos of African  _  such as lions, elephants, foxes and birds. He  _  these photos to the Royal Photographic Society of the UK. People at the RPS were  _  to see Sam's photos. They said the photos were so great. Sam likes photography and his dream is to be a  _  in the future. Sam's parents are  _  of their son. They encourage him to  _  his dream. They say his dream can come true one day.
